entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 10. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
